sentence: Israel  is  responding  to  an  attack  by  Hamas  on  Oct.  7  that  killed  about  1,200  people,  according  to  Israeli  officials.
Palestinian  officials  say  the  Israeli  response  has  killed  more  than  11,000.
"It's  both  targeting  our  civilians,  murdering  them,  mutilating  them,  but  also  hiding  behind  civilians  as  human  shields.  "
"You  had  to  act  to  try  to  minimize  civilian  casualties,  but  unfortunately  many  civilians  were  killed,"  he  said.
